summary: Elizabeth Brown Norris was an employee of the Select Committee on Assassinations (SCAS). She is listed in multiple payroll and certification reports from 1978. These documents provide her name, social security number, annual salary, and gross pay for specific periods. The documents span from April 1978 to December 1978, indicating her employment with the committee during that time.
significance: Elizabeth Brown Norris was an employee of the Select Committee on Assassinations, contributing to the committee's work during its investigation. The specific nature of her role is not detailed in these documents, but her presence on payroll and certification reports indicates her involvement in the committee's operations.
